```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(ggplot2)
library(gganimate)
library(plotly)
library(readxl)
library(lubridate)
library(gifski)
```


```{r}
abroad_raw <- read_excel("data/【海外】疫情数据.xlsx")
```

```{r}
data <- abroad_raw %>% 
  select(-name) %>% 
  pivot_longer(-country, names_to = "date", values_to = "number",values_drop_na = TRUE)%>%
  mutate(date = as.integer(date)) %>% 
  mutate(date = as.Date(date, origin="1899-12-30")) 
  
```
